recipesJson.name: Day Drinking
recipesJson.author: Daytimefrank1
recipesJson.description:
Sweet and refreshing seltzer type vape. Not boozy but when your homeschooling your brats and you just want to start drinking at 11am this is the type of vape Iâ€™d reach for. 

Collaboration with DIY Downunder on her channel.
